channel.title: robotics on Chris Allum Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in robotics on Chris Allum Portfolio

item.title: Fully Autonomous Rover
item.description: Overview With a team of 5 other Olin students, I helped built a fully autonomous rover that was capable of driving around campus.

item.title: Rocky: Stabilization of an Wheeled Inverted Pendulum
item.description: In this project, I helped design and implement a control system that maintains the balance of a wheeled inverted pendulum and corrects for angular disturbance.

item.title: Robotic Path Planning
item.description: In this project, I programed a Neato vacuuming robot to traverse an obstacle course.

item.title: High School Robotics
item.description: I was the head of my HS robotics team during my Junior and Senior years.

item.title: Honda Robotics Internship
item.description: I worked as a robotics intern at Honda Development and Manufacturing of America, specifically at the Alabama Automotive Plant.
